nodes.text: Beckoning Call Starr 3 was the third planet of the Beckoning Call Starr system, located in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. The planet had a reputation for beautiful women, with which the smuggler Han Solo was familiar.
Beckoning Call Starr 3 was created for the 1998 young-readers story Star Wars Journal: Hero for Hire, written by Donna Tauscher.
The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Beckoning Call Starr system, and therefore the planet itself, in grid square O-10.
